suppress.notes: file name: System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions.dll Suppressing this CVE Because it relates to a mobile "Tasks" application (Astrid Tasks) version before 9.7.3. ESS is not a mobile application.

file name: pyro.exe This is a vunerability in Pryo which is part of the WiX toolset. Although the vunerability is real, Pryo is a tool in the WiX toolset and is not deployed, it is simply used as part of building the .msi installer.
